comments.creator: jmaher@mozilla.com
comments.author: jmaher@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 542240
patch to move test_bug486990.xul to mochitest-chrome

this test case tests blocking and allowing events and it works for the most part.  First off, I am not sure if this test is useful to run as chrome or should be run both as chrome and plain.  Some guidance would be appreciated there.

Next, I see this error when run as a chrome test:
20 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should have got 'popupShowing' event! - got 2, expected 3
21 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should not have got 'popupshowing' event! - got 2, expected 3

If I comment out lines 129-131 (http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul#129), I get one failure:
20 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should not have got 'popupshowing' event! - got 4, expected 3


It seems that once we hit the preventDefault(), it is stopped for the rest of the test.  Attaching a patch that I used to make this run as a chrome test.
comments.raw_text:
this test case tests blocking and allowing events and it works for the most part.  First off, I am not sure if this test is useful to run as chrome or should be run both as chrome and plain.  Some guidance would be appreciated there.

Next, I see this error when run as a chrome test:
20 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should have got 'popupShowing' event! - got 2, expected 3
21 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should not have got 'popupshowing' event! - got 2, expected 3

If I comment out lines 129-131 (http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul#129), I get one failure:
20 ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/content/xul/content/test/test_bug486990.xul | Should not have got 'popupshowing' event! - got 4, expected 3


It seems that once we hit the preventDefault(), it is stopped for the rest of the test.  Attaching a patch that I used to make this run as a chrome test.

comments.creator: neil@httl.net
comments.author: neil@httl.net
comments.text: The test appears to test the dom.event.contextmenu.enabled pref, which affects content only; I don't think it's useful to run this as chrome.
comments.raw_text: The test appears to test the dom.event.contextmenu.enabled pref, which affects content only; I don't think it's useful to run this as chrome.
